title: Will the Q36.5 Gamble Pay Off or Blow Up for Tom Pidcock?
content:
Face Off: From big budget WorldTour juggernaut to upstart second-tier crew, we debate whether Pidcock made the right call to leave Ineos Grenadiers.

Read the full article at Will the Q36.5 Gamble Pay Off or Blow Up for Tom Pidcock? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
